newsitem.title: UK: INSIGHT-Cocoa picture neutral, may test support.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT-Cocoa picture neutral, may test support.

text.p: SEPT Close * Support * Resist * RSI14 * MA10 * MA30
Cocoa presents a largely neutral picture but it could have a go at support at 1,000 stg, analysts said.
Traders said it was due to open five stg lower.

Elli Gifford, an independent technical analyst, advised against reading too much into the "pretty neutral," chart picture on cocoa. "It's probably more likely to test support than challenge resistance," she said.
On Monday, New York cocoa futures ended lower and toward the bottom of the day's range, pressured by a late-session round of speculative long liquidation, dealers said.
Turnover, however, was unimpressive, at an estimated 5,609 lots.
"It was thin all day, lackadaisical," said one trader. "There was spec liquidation, but some manufacturer buying at the lows kept it from being a total wash-out."
